verbose_text: This conclusion relies on the premise that the YFP and LacZ reporter genes are continuously expressed under the ROSA26 promoter in the progeny of hypertrophic or prehypertrophic chondrocytes, once the ROSA26 fl/fl locus is activated by the Cre recombinase expressed by our BACCol10Cre lines.
evidence: LacZ reporter genes are continuously expressed
